name: Castlevania: The Lecarde Chronicles 2
summary:
Castlevania: The Lecarde Chronicles 2 is a fan-game produced by independent free-game producer Migami Games in the year 2017. It is the sequel to Castlevania: The Lecarde Chronicles.

Unlike its predecessor, The Lecarde Chronicles 2 follows a nonlinear approach, borrowing elements from Castlevania II: Simon's Quest and various Metroidvania titles. While there is no leveling system, you may strengthen your character by collecting HP extenders, heart extenders, weapons, armor, rings, necklaces and artifacts.
